name: ResttW
description:
Restt is an addictive game, which will test how well can you handle your anger and stress. The game is in hand-made graphics with a retro touch. The whole game is inspired by Slovak streamer resttpowered.

There are fifty-seven unique levels in this game. Six of those levels are bosses. The entire game runs in a 2D. There are also authentic catchphrases from restt’s environment.

There is no internet required to play. (For download only.)
